pl.matblog.hpcimagetransform

Interface HPCPixelShader


  • public interface HPCPixelShader
    Pixel shader interface for HPC RMI Server / Distributed Computing pixel shader for graphic transform The source code distributed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 (Attribution-commercial use) Details: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/ Created by Mateusz_Mierzwinski on 16.11.14.

      Apply pixel shader at specified position

      Returns radius of implemented pixel shader

        Returns radius of implemented pixel shader

      • applyPixelShader

        void applyPixelShader(java.awt.Color[][] bitmapPixelArray,
                      java.awt.Point currentPixelPosition)
        Apply pixel shader at specified position
        Parameters:

        currentPixelPosition - - current pixel position of shader
